ModMetaData.name: Machines Never Breakdown
ModMetaData.author: Mayor_Mike
ModMetaData.description: Machines no longer breakdown and need a component for repair. Continued from k2ymg.\nWhile the original works, it is nice to see it appear as supported by the game.\nUnsure if it is compatible with other mods, but seems to work fine at the bottom of a mods list.
